description: Low cut, high comfort. The Bunion version of Hanwag's comfortable, low-cut classic Banks hiking boot. Made out of high-quality nubuck and suede leather for wearers with a hallux valgus. A combination of reinforced PU foam wedge and high-quality footbed offers good cushioning and soft roll-off performance.<br><br>*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: Banks Low Bunion GTX Lady - Womens
